file_content.text: Sir, I've picked up an urgent transmission from the Crescent Canyon Facility. Putting it through now.
Aurek Base, do you read me? The Empire is here!
How far away are they? Why didn't your long-range sensors detect an Imperial attack?
Where is that signal from?
They're in the geothermal plant in Crescent Canyon. We don't have any sensors near there.
Those poor people....
That doesn't look good.
That's going to get messy.
Those people have been kicked around by everyone who's come here.
I'll admit, I didn't expect to find civilians on Hoth. Why would anyone choose to live here?
What are they doing here?
The Ortolans were the first people on Hoth. They came here as colonists.
Their facility at Crescent Canyon has the best cold-weather technology on Hoth. Technology that's now in Imperial hands.
I'll go see what can be done to save these colonists.
I'll go there now.
Thank you.
That transmission doesn't make me think they're strong allies.
Do we really need them?
They're not great soldiers, but they know Hoth and can travel in the cold to reach our more distant outposts.
How do I help them, exactly?
Try to reach Supervisor Aldogh. He's in charge of the facility. Contact me once you've found him. Good luck.
It worked! When I got a transmission from the Talz, I thought it might've been a fluke. This is fantastic!
Lieutenant, we're receiving messages on all channels. Cresh Outpost is reporting in now.
We're not alone out here anymore. This is going to be fabulous for morale.
With communications back online, you should be able to call for backup. Or at least new orders.
Can you call for help now?
I'm glad to hear it.
Is there anything happening out there that I should know about?
Any news from the outposts?
If the Ortolans are really in slave collars, you'll need to get the keys from the Imperials.
They're putting us in slave collars! You've got to send help! We--no, he's coming!
They're killing anyone who doesn't surrender! You've got to send help! We--no, he's coming!
